review.reviewBody: the food is always fresh, tasty, and amazing.

Chicken Tandoori was good, Garlic Naan was delicious. Bombay Butter Chicken was tasty too but WAY too small of a portion, like half? a chicken breast.  Needs to be at least double the size at the price point
It was pulao not biryani. Just flavored rice with smoky flavor

Not entirely what I would expect from Indian food - Butter Chicken GF had an unexpected spice I couldn't place and the sauce was quite spicy for butter chicken. Garlic Naan was good but garlic a little burnt.
Insanely oily "chicken tikka masala". I'm not even sure if it's tikka. It kinda tastes like fish and the insane amount of oil made it barely eatableChicken Tikka Masala GF|
